title: Advent
verses: Don't you see my Jesus coming, Don't you
Don't you see the saints ascending, Hear them
see in yonder cloud! With ten thousand angels
shouting through the air! Jesus smiling, trumpets
round him, With ten thousand angels round him,

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Vivid depiction of Christ's advent with ten thousand angels and the saints' ascension
